newsitem.title: UK: PRESS DIGEST - London-based Arab newspapers - Jan 20.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - London-based Arab newspapers - Jan 20.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in two London-based Arabic-language newspapers on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Abu Dhabi National Oil Comapny to cut liquified gas prices from Monday.
- Saudi industry and electricity minister agrees on 65 industrial projects with total investment of $275 million.
- Yemen's premier denies any pressure on the government from the International Monetary Fund and the World Bank.
- United Arab Emirates to sign $7 billion military offset projects until the year 2000, official says.
- Saudi Arabia seeks to boost trade links with Canada.
- The Arab Bank for Investment and Trade posts a 161 million dirham net profit in 1996.
